verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> are the words <S%H1697><s%> of the letter <S%H5612><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the exile, <S%H1540><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> had taken <S%H1540><s%> into exile <S%H1473><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

(This was after <S%H310><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%> and the queen <S%H1377><s%> mother, <S%H1377><s%> the court <S%H5631><s%> officials, <S%H5631><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the craftsmen <S%H2796><s%> and the smiths <S%H4525><s%> had departed <S%H3318><s%> from Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>)

[The letter was sent <S%H7971><s%>] by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Elasah <S%H501><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan, <S%H8227><s%> and Gemariah <S%H1587><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah, <S%H2518><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> sent to Babylon <S%H894><s%> to Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the exiles <S%H1473><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I have sent <S%H1540><s%> into exile <S%H1540><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to Babylon, <S%H894><s%>
'Build <S%H1129><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%> and live <S%H3427><s%> [in them;] and plant <S%H5193><s%> gardens, <S%H1593><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> their produce. <S%H6529><s%>

'Take <S%H3947><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> and become <S%H3205><s%> the fathers <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> for your sons <S%H1121><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> to husbands, <S%H376><s%> that they may bear <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters; <S%H1323><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> and do not decrease. <S%H4591><s%>

'And seek <S%H1875><s%> the welfare <S%H7965><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have sent <S%H1540><s%> you into exile, <S%H1540><s%> and pray <S%H6419><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> on its behalf; <S%H1157><s%> for in its welfare <S%H7965><s%> you will have <S%H1961><s%> welfare. <S%H7965><s%> '

"For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'Do not let your prophets <S%H5030><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are in your midst <S%H7130><s%> and your diviners <S%H7080><s%> deceive <S%H5378><s%> you, and do not listen <S%H8085><s%> to the dreams <S%H2472><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they dream. <S%H2492><s%>
'For they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> to you in My name; <S%H8034><s%> I have not sent <S%H7971><s%> them,' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'When <S%H3588><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> have been <S%H4390><s%> completed <S%H4390><s%> for Babylon, <S%H894><s%> I will visit <S%H6485><s%> you and fulfill <S%H6965><s%> My good <S%H2896><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> to you, to bring <S%H7725><s%> you back <S%H7725><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>

'For I know <S%H3045><s%> the plans <S%H4284><s%> that I have <S%H2803><s%> for you,' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'plans <S%H4284><s%> for welfare <S%H7965><s%> and not for calamity <S%H9567><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you a future <S%H319><s%> and a hope. <S%H8615><s%>
'Then you will call <S%H7121><s%> upon Me and come <S%H1980><s%> and pray <S%H6419><s%> to Me, and I will listen <S%H8085><s%> to you.
'And you will seek <S%H1245><s%> Me and find <S%H4672><s%> [Me,] when <S%H3588><s%> you search <S%H1875><s%> for Me with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart. <S%H3824><s%>

'And I will be found <S%H4672><s%> by you,' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'and I will restore <S%H7725><s%> your fortunes <S%H7622><s%> and will gather <S%H6908><s%> you from all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> and from all <S%H3605><s%> the places <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have driven <S%H5080><s%> you,' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'and I will bring <S%H7725><s%> you back <S%H7725><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> from where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I sent <S%H1540><s%> you into exile. <S%H1540><s%>'
"Because <S%H3588><s%> you have said, <S%H559><s%> 'The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has raised <S%H6965><s%> up prophets <S%H5030><s%> for us in Babylon <S%H894><s%>' –

for thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> who sits <S%H3427><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> and concerning <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in this <S%H384><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> who <S%H834><s%> did not go <S%H3318><s%> with you into exile <S%H1473><s%> –

thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am sending <S%H7971><s%> upon them the sword, <S%H2719><s%> famine, <S%H7458><s%> and pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> them like split-open figs <S%H8384><s%> that cannot <S%H3808><s%> be eaten <S%H398><s%> due <S%H4480><s%> to rottenness. <S%H7455><s%>

'And I will pursue <S%H7291><s%> them with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> with famine <S%H7458><s%> and with pestilence; <S%H1698><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> them a terror <S%H2113><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> to be a curse, <S%H423><s%> and a horror, <S%H8047><s%> and a hissing, <S%H8322><s%> and a reproach <S%H2781><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have driven <S%H5080><s%> them,

because <S%H8478><s%> <S%H834><s%> they have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to My words, <S%H1697><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> 'which <S%H834><s%> I sent <S%H7971><s%> to them again <S%H7925><s%> and again <S%H7971><s%> by My servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets; <S%H5030><s%> but you did not listen, <S%H8085><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"You, therefore, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you exiles, <S%H1473><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I have sent <S%H7971><s%> away <S%H7971><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> Ahab <S%H256><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kolaiah <S%H6964><s%> and concerning <S%H413><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maaseiah, <S%H4641><s%> who are prophesying <S%H5012><s%> to you falsely <S%H8267><s%> in My name, <S%H8034><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and he shall slay <S%H5221><s%> them before your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

'And because <S%H4480><s%> of them a curse <S%H7045><s%> shall be used <S%H3947><s%> by all <S%H3605><s%> the exiles <S%H1546><s%> from Judah <S%H3063><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are in Babylon, <S%H894><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "May the Lord <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H7760><s%> you like Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> and like Ahab, <S%H256><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> roasted <S%H7033><s%> in the fire, <S%H784><s%>

because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> they have acted <S%H6213><s%> foolishly <S%H5039><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and have committed <S%H5003><s%> adultery <S%H5003><s%> with their neighbors' wives, <S%H802><s%> and have spoken <S%H1696><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> in My name <S%H8034><s%> falsely, <S%H8267><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I did not command <S%H6680><s%> them; and I am He who knows, <S%H3045><s%> and am a witness, <S%H5707><s%> "declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> '"
And to Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the Nehelamite <S%H5161><s%> you shall speak, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have sent <S%H7971><s%> letters <S%H5612><s%> in your own name <S%H8034><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and to Zephaniah <S%H6846><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maaseiah, <S%H4641><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has made <S%H5414><s%> you priest <S%H3548><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> to be the overseer <S%H6496><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> over every <S%H3605><s%> madman <S%H7696><s%> who prophesies, <S%H5012><s%> to put <S%H5414><s%> him in the stocks <S%H4115><s%> and in the iron <S%H6729><s%> collar, <S%H6729><s%>
now <S%H6258><s%> then, why <S%H4100><s%> have you not rebuked <S%H1605><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> of Anathoth <S%H6069><s%> who prophesies <S%H5012><s%> to you?

"For he has sent <S%H7971><s%> to us in Babylon, <S%H894><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> '[The exile] will be long; <S%H752><s%> build <S%H1129><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%> and live <S%H3427><s%> [in them] and plant <S%H5193><s%> gardens <S%H1593><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> their produce. <S%H6529><s%>'"'"
And Zephaniah <S%H6846><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> read <S%H7121><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> letter <S%H5612><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet. <S%H5030><s%>
Then came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Send <S%H7971><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the exiles, <S%H1473><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the Nehelamite, <S%H5161><s%>" Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> has prophesied <S%H5012><s%> to you, although I did not send <S%H7971><s%> him, and he has made you trust <S%H982><s%> in a lie, <S%H8267><s%> "

therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am about to punish <S%H6485><s%> Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the Nehelamite <S%H5161><s%> and his descendants; <S%H2233><s%> he shall not have <S%H1961><s%> anyone <S%H376><s%> living <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and he shall not see <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H9185><s%> that I am about to do <S%H6213><s%> to My people, <S%H5971><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "because <S%H3588><s%> he has preached <S%H1696><s%> rebellion <S%H5627><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"' "
